opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Colburn v. Cockrell, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division

opinion:
537 U.S. 1016

COLBURN
v.
COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.

No. 02A376.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 8, 2002.

1

Petitioner is directed to file a petition for writ of certiorari on or before 3 p.m., Monday, December 9, 2002. A brief in opposition is due on or before 3 p.m., Monday, December 30, 2002. A reply brief, if any, shall be filed within seven days of the filing of the brief in opposition. This Court's Rule 29.2 does not apply.
